checks.msg: AppArmor annotation missing. The annotation 'container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/linux-audit-exporter' should be added.
Default service account with token mounted. automountServiceAccountToken should be set to 'false' on either the ServiceAccount or on the PodSpec or a non-default service account should be used.

Capability "AUDIT_READ" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/linux-audit-exporter.allow-capability-audit-read: SomeReason'.
hostPID is set to 'true' in PodSpec. It should be set to 'false'.
runAsUser is set to UID 0 (root user) in the container SecurityContext. Either set it to a value > 0 or remove it and set runAsNonRoot to true.
allowPrivilegeEscalation not set which allows privilege escalation. It should be set to 'false'.
Pod Seccomp profile is missing. Seccomp profile should be added to the pod SecurityContext.
